definitions: 苦い[にがい] (adj-i) bitter
english: Thanks… Gross…this is bitter.
japanese: ありがと……うえ～、[にがい]

definitions: 暖簾[のれん] (n) (short) curtain hung at shop entrance, split curtain used to divide spaces in a house,reputation (of a store), good name, credit,goodwill
english: Where are the others?
japanese: 他[のれん]ちゅう？

definitions: 隠れる[かくれる] (v1, vi) to hide, to be hidden, to conceal oneself, to disappear
english: I dunno. Aren't they hiding somewhere around here?
japanese: さあ、そのへんに[かくれ]てんじゃないの？

definitions: 機関[きかん] (n) engine,agency, organisation, organization, institution, organ, body,system, facility, facilities
絡繰り[からくり] (n) mechanism, machinery, contrivance, device,trick, dodge,mechanical doll, string puppet
english: …the Engine Room… …a suspicious…character…
japanese: ……[機関]室に……不審……人物……

definitions: キリキリ (adv) chafing, grinding (e.g. teeth),binding tightly, pulling tight (e.g. a bow),rotating quickly,hurting sharply,briskly, quickly, promptly, at once, right away
english: Hey, get to work!
japanese: コラ、きさまも[キリキリ]はたらかんか！

definitions: 統括[とうかつ] (n, vs) unification, bringing together, generalization,control, supervision
english: Both the new President Rufus and Heidegger are aboard this ship!
japanese: いま、この船にはルーファウス新社長と本社のハイデッガー[統括]が乗船されている！

definitions: 乗船[じょうせん] (n) embarking (a ship), embarkation, boarding,ship (carrying someone)
english: Both the new President Rufus and Heidegger are aboard this ship!
japanese: いま、この船にはルーファウス新社長と本社のハイデッガー統括が[乗船]されている！

definitions: 昇進[しょうしん] (n, vs, adj-no) promotion, advancement, rising in rank
english: If we do good, we could get promoted!
japanese: うまくすれば[昇進]のチャンスだぞ！

definitions: 呪う[のろう] (v5u, vt) to curse, to put a curse on, to detest intensely
english: Let's ride the Airship together, OK? Promise, promise me!
japanese: 一練に[のろう]ね、飛空艇。約束、約束！

definitions: 得[とく] (adj-na, n) profit, advantage, benefit, gain,rebirth in paradise, entering nirvana

解く[とく] (v5k, vt) to untie, to unfasten, to unwrap, to undo, to unbind, to unpack,to unsew, to unstitch,to solve, to work out, to answer,to dispel (misunderstanding, etc.), to clear up, to remove (suspicion), to appease,to dissolve (a contract), to cancel, to remove (a prohibition), to lift (a ban), to raise (a siege),to release (from duty), to relieve, to dismiss,to comb (out), to card, to untangle (hair)
説く[とく] (v5k) to explain, to advocate, to preach, to persuade
溶く[とく] (v5k, vt) to dissolve (paint), to scramble (eggs), to melt (metal, etc.), to mix (water with flour, etc.)
匿[とく] (n) shelter, shield, hide
梳く[すく] (v5k, vt) to comb (out), to card, to untangle (hair)
徳[とく] (n) virtue,benevolence,profit, benefit, advantage
とく (aux-v, v5k) to do something in readiness for, to get something (needful) done
疾く[とく] (n, adj-no) quickly, swiftly,already, before,long time ago
english: The only one who's gonna benefit from this is the Chief, anyway.
japanese: どうせ[トク]するのはあそこのチーフだけ

definitions: チーフ (n) chief
english: The only one who's gonna benefit from this is the Chief, anyway.
japanese: どうせトクするのはあそこの[チーフ]だけ

definitions: 呑気[のんき] (adj-na, n) carefree, optimistic, careless, reckless, heedless, happy-go-lucky, easygoing, thoughtless
english: How can he… Goin' off laughin' like that?
japanese: なんだあのヤロ……[のんき]にガハガハガハガハ笑いやがって……

definitions: いっそ (adv) rather, sooner, preferably
english: I'm gonna settle things here and now!
japanese: [いっそ]のこと、ここで一気にカタをつけ……

definitions: 付け[つけ] (n) bill, bill of sale, payment invoice,tab (for later payment), credit,contact move (in go), direct attack to an enemy stone,sound effect produced by striking with clappers a wooden board in kabuki,letter,reason, motive, pretext,one's fortune, one's luck
english: I'm gonna settle things here and now!
japanese: いっそのこと、ここで一気にカタを[つけ]……

definitions: 各員[かくいん] (n-adv, n-t) each one
english: Emergency alert! Reports of a stowaway found! Those not on detail, search the ship. Report when found!
japanese: 緊急連絡！不審人物を発見の報告アリ！作業のない[各員]は監内を調査。発見しだい通報のこと！

definitions: 通報[つうほう] (n, vs) report, notification, tip, bulletin,message (in information and communication theory)
english: Emergency alert! Reports of a stowaway found! Those not on detail, search the ship. Report when found!
japanese: 緊急連絡！不審人物を発見の報告アリ！作業のない各員は監内を調査。発見しだい[通報]のこと！

definitions: 奪う[うばう] (v5u, vt) to snatch away, to dispossess, to steal
english: They take away all the things and people you love…
japanese: 大切なものを、大切な人をみんなから[うばっ]てしまうから……

definitions: 張り切る[はりきる] (v5r) to be in high spirits, to be full of vigor (vigour), to be enthusiastic, to be eager, to stretch to breaking point
english: Uh, yes sir, I'll continue my watch sir!  Hee hee…
japanese: それでは、[はりきっ]て見張りをつづけるであります！フフフ……

definitions: ガッツ (n) guts
english: A seaman's gotta have umph!
japanese: 海の男は[ガッツ]だ、ガッツ！

definitions: 物足りない[ものたりない] (adj-i) unsatisfied, unsatisfactory, insufficient
english: Something's missing
japanese: なにか[物足りない]んだ

definitions: クルー (n) crew
english: Say, who are you? You're not a part of the crew.
japanese: ん、何だお前？この船の[クルー]じゃねえな？

definitions: 細かい[こまかい] (adj-i) small,fine, minute,minor, trivial,sensitive, attentive
english: Oh well, seamen never bother with details!
japanese: まあいいか、海の男は[こまかい]ことを気にしねえのよ！

definitions: スーパー (adj-f) supermarket,subtitles, telop,superheterodyne,super
english: I got just the perfect thing! Invisible Alpha'-- A super drink for seamen!!
japanese: そういう時はコイツ！海の男の[スーパー]ドリンク『インビンシブルα』！！

definitions: 船乗り[ふなのり] (n) getting on board,sailor, seaman
english: Thanks! This is a necessity for a sailor.
japanese: まいど！コイツは[船乗り]にかかせねえ品だぜ

definitions: 品[しな] (n) article, item, thing, goods, stock,quality,flirtatiousness, coquetry
品[ひん] (suf, ctr) elegance, grace, refinement, class, dignity,article, item,counter for items (of food, etc.), counter for dishes or courses (at a restaurant)
品[ほん] (suf) court rank,level, grade,chapter, section, volume
english: Thanks! This is a necessity for a sailor.
japanese: まいど！コイツは船乗りにかかせねえ[品]だぜ

definitions: マスト (n) mast,necessary, mandatory, indispensable,must, [object Object]
english: This is a must item for a sailor! Ha ha ha !
japanese: 船乗りだけにこれがホントの[マスト]アイテム！ワッハッハッハ！

definitions: 突き進む[つきすすむ] (v5m, vi) to push on, to plunge forward, to push one's way to
english: Thanks! Now let's get on with it!
japanese: まいど！コイツでガンガン[つきすすも]うぜ

definitions: ケチケチ (adv, vs) stingy, tightfisted, miserly
english: Hey! Seamen shouldn't be so stingy!
japanese: オウオウ！海の男が[ケチケチ]すんない！

definitions: サボる (v5r, vi) to be truant, to play hooky, to skip school, to skip out, to be idle, to sabotage by slowness
english: President Rufus and his men are in the Bridge of the Ship. If they see you slacking, they'll bust you one!
japanese: ルーファウス社長たちは監橋にいるらしい。[サボっ]てるとドヤされるぜ！

definitions: 大抵[たいてい] (adj-na) mostly, ordinarily, usually, generally,probably,most, almost all,ordinary,proper, appropriate, moderate
退廷[たいてい] (n, vs) leaving a court
大帝[たいてい] (n) great emperor, ... the Great
english: Humans only look at appearances anyway.
japanese: 人間というものは[たいてい]、ものごとのそとがわしか見ないからな

definitions: ビーチ (n) beach
english: When I get there, I'm going to take a long overdue vacation. Maybe I'll go down to the beach and get a tan…
japanese: 向こうについたらひさしぶりの休みだ。[ビーチ]で体をやこうかな……

definitions: 梃子[てこ] (n) lever
english: You don't think that suspicious stowaway is…
japanese: [てこ]とは不審人物ってのはまさか……

definitions: 靴[くつ] (n) shoe, shoes, boots, footwear, footgear
english: These clothes are too tight on me. Can I switch with you?
japanese: この服はきゅう[くつ]だ。できればそっちに加わりたい

definitions: 加わる[くわわる] (v5r, vi) to be added to, to be appended,to join in (e.g. a group of friends), to participate,to increase (e.g. heat), to gain in (e.g. influence), to grow, to gather (speed),to be applied (e.g. heat, pressure), to be exerted
english: These clothes are too tight on me. Can I switch with you?
japanese: この服はきゅうくつだ。できればそっちに[加わり]たい

definitions: 斬る[きる] (v5r, vt) to kill (a human) using a blade (sword, machete, knife, etc.), to slice (off), to lop (off), to cut (off)
english: Received "Wind Slash"!
japanese: 『風[斬り]』を手にいれた！

definitions: 眠り[ねむり] (n) sleep, sleeping,inactivity,death
english: …After a long sleep…
japanese: ……長き[眠り]をへて……

definitions: 接岸[せつがん] (n, vs) coming alongside a pier, quay, etc., reaching land (of a boat)
english: Dock workers--We will be docking in Costa del Sol in 5 minutes. Prepare for docking.
japanese: [接岸]作業員コスタ・デル・ソル入港５分前接岸準備を開始せよ

definitions: 員[いん] (n, n-suf) member
english: Dock workers--We will be docking in Costa del Sol in 5 minutes. Prepare for docking.
japanese: 接岸作業[員]コスタ・デル・ソル入港５分前接岸準備を開始せよ

definitions: 入港[にゅうこう] (n, vs) entry into port, arriving in harbor
english: Dock workers--We will be docking in Costa del Sol in 5 minutes. Prepare for docking.
japanese: 接岸作業員コスタ・デル・ソル[入港]５分前接岸準備を開始せよ

definitions: 整理[せいり] (n, vs) sorting, arrangement, organization, putting in order, adjustment, regulation,liquidation, settlement, consolidation, clearance (e.g. debt), paying off,retrenchment, curtailment, cutting down, disposal
english: CLOUD, why don't you explain to me what's happened so far?
japanese: CLOUD、ちょっとここまでを[整理]してくれねえか？

definitions: 面倒くさい[めんどくさい] (adj-i) bothersome, tiresome, bother to do
english: Too much trouble
japanese: [めんどうくさい]

definitions: こんがらがる (v5r, vi) to become entangled, to become complicated, to get mixed up, to screw up, to get caught up in
english: I'm getting so confused…
japanese: [こんがらがっ]てきちゃった……

definitions: 然程[さほど] (adv, conj) not so, not particularly, not very, not that much
english: Hmm… The story's not that simple.
japanese: フム……話は[さほど]単純ではなさそうだ。

definitions: 挟む[はさむ] (v5m, vt) to hold between (e.g. one's fingers, chopsticks), to grip (from both sides),to put between, to sandwich between, to insert, to interpose,to catch (e.g. a finger in a door), to trap, to pinch,to insert (e.g. a break into proceedings), to interpose (e.g. an objection), to interject, to throw in (e.g. a joke),to be on either side of (a road, table, etc.), to have between each other, to be across (a street, river, etc.),to harbour (feelings), to cast (e.g. doubt)
剪む[はさむ] (v5m, vt) to clip, to snip
english: …I'll try, but don't interrupt me while I'm explaining.
japanese: ……やってみるから途中で口を[はさま]ないでくれよ

definitions: 従兄弟[いとこ] (n) cousin (male)
従兄[じゅうけい] (n) cousin (elder male)
従姉[じゅうし] (n) cousin (elder female)
従姉妹[いとこ] (n) cousin (female)
従弟[じゅうてい] (n) cousin (younger male)
従妹[じゅうまい] (n) cousin (younger female)
english: Whoa! We'd best hurry and hide somewhere.
japanese: おおっと！はや[いとこ]隠れたほうがよさそうだぜ

definitions: 籠もる[こもる] (v5r, vi) to shut oneself in (e.g. one's room), to be confined in, to seclude oneself, to hide away, to stay inside (one's shell),to be filled with (emotion, enthusiasm, etc.),to fill the room (of a gas, smell, etc.), to be heavy with (e.g. smoke), to be stuffy, to be dense,to be muffled (e.g. voice),to hold (a castle, fortress, etc.),to confine oneself in a temple to pray
隠る[なまる] (v5r, vi) to hide, to be hidden, to conceal oneself, to disappear
english: Phew… We're finally here… Now we gotta hide.
japanese: ホッ……やっとついた……はやく[隠れ]……ウップ
